title: Azumi 2 Love or Death [2005] [Jap] [Sub-Eng]-Hammer71
description:
Azumi 2: Love or Death (2005)

(more info regarding length below)

Some might wonder why this movie is only 108 Minutes.
I decided to try something besides the norm.
I wanted to see what kind of Bitrate could be made if the
end Credits were mostly removed.
Since there were no hidden scenes in there.
(some people like them, some don&#039;t)

Basically, the 108 minutes of runtime:
100% movie(with partial credits)
ALL of the actual movie is fully intact.

I noticed that quite a few people could only find mainly
either French/Spanish versions of this fantastic film.
That or the English Subs had been hard-coded.
